com.bluegosling.concurrent

Interface FutureListener<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of future result support by this listener
    Functional Interface:
    This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.

    @FunctionalInterface
public interface FutureListener<T>
    A listener for the completion of a future. When registered with a future, the listener will be called once the future completes.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static <T> FutureListener<T> forConsumer(Consumer<? super FluentFuture<T>> consumer)
      Adapts a Consumer to the FutureListener interface.
      static FutureListener<Object> forRunnable(Runnable runnable)
      Creates a listener that will execute the specified task when the future completes.
      static <T> FutureListener<T> forVisitor(FutureVisitor<T> visitor)
      Creates a listener that will visit the completed future.
      void onCompletion(FluentFuture<? extends T> completedFuture)
      Invoked when a future completes.

    • Method Detail

      • onCompletion

        void onCompletion(FluentFuture<? extends T> completedFuture)
        Invoked when a future completes.
        Parameters:
        completedFuture - the completed future

      • forVisitor

        static <T> FutureListener<T> forVisitor(FutureVisitor<T> visitor)
        Creates a listener that will visit the completed future. When the listener is called from a completed future, that listener uses the specified visitor to visit the completed future.
        Parameters:
        visitor - the visitor
        Returns:
        a listener that uses the visitor when invoked

      • forRunnable

        static FutureListener<Object> forRunnable(Runnable runnable)
        Creates a listener that will execute the specified task when the future completes.
        Parameters:
        runnable - the task to run when the future completes
        Returns:
        a listener that invokes the specified task

      • forConsumer

        static <T> FutureListener<T> forConsumer(Consumer<? super FluentFuture<T>> consumer)
        Adapts a Consumer to the FutureListener interface.
        Parameters:
        consumer - a consumer
        Returns:
        a listener that calls consumer.accept(completedFuture) when invoked
